_header: Why sittest thou so singing thinkest thou nothing
Subjects: purgatory, pains of; carols, of saints
_description: Verses reminding reader to remember the Pains of Purgatory — six stanzas of four monorhyming lines plus monorhyming refrain of increasing length, each ending ‘Thou schalt aby / This worlde defygh’ and burden: ‘Peas I hier a voyce saith man thou shalt dye / Remembre the paynes of purgatorie’

RylandsLat395.First Lines:
Why sittist thou so syngyng þenkyst þou nothyngÞat
                    who so best hoppith at laste shal haue the ryng…
RylandsLat395.Last Lines:
…Of the nombre dampned see that I be noonePray for me
                    highNow god me guyI fere me IWith dulfull cryI shall
                    abyThis world defyghPeas I hier
